sections.title: Introduction & Role Context
sections.goal: Understand participant roles, daily responsibilities, and relationship to Vesta FinOps project.
sample_questions: Can you describe your current role and how it connects to the Vesta FinOps initiative?
What are your main responsibilities in the Operate phase of this project?
How do you usually interact with other departments like SRE or Platform in cost optimization efforts?

sections.title: Current Processes & Tooling
sections.goal: Explore existing workflows, tools, and runbooks used for cost optimization and guardrails.
sample_questions: Which runbooks or RFCs do you reference most often when enforcing budgets and quotas?
Can you walk me through a recent use of RB-FIN-007 Idle Resource Reaper?
What metrics or dashboards do you rely on to identify cost anomalies?

sections.title: Cross-Team Collaboration
sections.goal: Investigate how FinOps and DevOps coordinate on automation, IaC, and policy enforcement.
sample_questions: How do you collaborate with DevOps engineers to implement RFC-1502 Resource Quotas & Budgets?
Can you give an example of a multi-team effort where cost guardrails were embedded in CI/CD pipelines?
What challenges arise when aligning cost optimization with deployment velocity?

sections.title: Pain Points & Opportunities
sections.goal: Identify friction points, gaps in tooling, and opportunities for improvement in cost control.
sample_questions: What’s the most common cause of budget overruns in your experience?
Where do you see the biggest opportunity for automation in FinOps processes?
How do you balance cost savings with maintaining agreed SLAs?

sections.title: Risk Management & Decision Making
sections.goal: Understand tradeoffs, risk considerations, and evidence-based decisions in cost optimization.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through a decision where you had to choose between cost savings and performance?
What evidence or metrics do you require before approving a cost-related change?
How do you assess the blast radius of cost-cutting measures?

sections.title: Future Vision & Wrap-up
sections.goal: Capture aspirations, desired features, and closing reflections.
sample_questions: If you could redesign one aspect of the Vesta FinOps process, what would it be?
What’s your long-term vision for cost optimization at Novereon?
Is there anything we haven’t discussed that you think is important?
